ing: 1 Royal Gala apple - peeled, cored and sliced
des: "Great filling for turnovers, or a topping for funnel cake or pork!"
ins: Melt butter in a skillet over low heat. Add apples, and increase the heat to medium-high. Cook for 5 minutes, stirring occasionally. Stir in the white wine, brown sugar, cinnamon, vanilla, and golden raisins. Cook over medium heat until the liquid has reduced and is thick.
